title: Avery's Mal Vocab - Section {section}
theme: The setting is the world of the Disney "Descendants" movies, including all four films. Main characters like Mal, Evie, Carlos, Jay, Ben, Uma, Audrey, and others may sometimes be mentioned. Scenes may take place in Auradon Prep, the Isle of the Lost, or other familiar locations. These characters and places do not need to appear in every sentence.

sections.subtitle: Marshy Isle alleys, sharp rose spines, and habits that help villains thrive

entries.definition: To hold; to have within itself.
entries.sentence: This magic box can ### every cursed jewel from the Isle.

entries.definition: A jar, box, or other object used for holding something.
entries.sentence: Evie kept her glowing potion in a safe ### on her shelf.

entries.definition: To change food that has been eaten into simpler forms that the body can use.
entries.sentence: Carlos needed time to ### all that enchanted feast food.
Mal can be ### about spells; every word must be perfect.

entries.definition: Something that a person does so often that it is done without thinking.
entries.sentence: Jay has a ### of grabbing treasure before thinking it through.

entries.definition: A special kind of clothing worn by certain groups.
entries.sentence: The royal guards wore a matching ### during the coronation parade.

entries.definition: A joint on a lid or door that allows it to swing open or shut.
entries.sentence: The rusty ### on the Isle gate squeaked when Uma pushed it.

entries.definition: A low-lying area, often covered with tall grasses, where the ground is soft and wet.
entries.sentence: They sneaked across a dark ### near the docks to hide.
The ### ground near the Isle shore soaked Ben's fancy shoes.

entries.definition: A room or other place set aside for the use of babies and small children.
entries.sentence: The castle ### was filled with baby dragon toys and blankets.

entries.definition: A place where plants are grown for sale.
entries.sentence: Mal visited a plant ### to find rare spell ingredients.

entries.definition: To count on; to look to for support.
entries.sentence: Evie knew she could ### on Mal to keep every promise.
Jay is a ### teammate when a heist needs quick thinking.
A chilly fear ran down Audrey's ### during the shadow attack.

entries.definition: A thin, sharp, stiff part that sticks out on certain plants and animals.
entries.sentence: Each cursed rose had one glowing ### that could prick you.

entries.definition: To do well; to grow strong and healthy.
entries.sentence: Friendships ### in Auradon when villains and royals work together.
